Choose the right hosting for your website at laceibanetsociety.com 
Linux and Windows shared hosting available for as low as $2.95 a month, no need for long term contracts. All servers DDoS protected to protect your website and with high bandwidth caps to make sure your site can handle the high visitors you expect.

Basic cPanel plan includes:

-1 Gb Disk Space

-100 Gb Bandwidth

-50 email accounts

-1 hosted domain

-1 parked to hosted domain

Plan starting at $2.95/mo dedicated ip available. Central America and EU ip available. This and many more plans to choose from, so choose the one right for you http://laceibanetsociety.com/en/web-hosting/cpanel-web-hosting/
